
# Base Adresse Nationale

Téléchargement des fichiers: https://adresse.data.gouv.fr/data/ban/adresses/latest/csv/


```{r}
ban35=fread("../data/ban/adresses-35.csv",encoding = "UTF-8")
ban35000=ban35[code_postal==35000,]

ban35000_voie=unique(ban35000[,c("nom_voie")])


```



# Distance textuelle

Cas d'usage

- 


```{r}
ad_cor=c("ave gros malon")

stringdist("malllllllland","malhon",method = 'soundex')

stringdist("malllllllland","malhon",method = 'lv')

stringdist("malllllllland","malhon",method = 'jw')

```
